centerName: URBAN STRATEGIES INCFANNIE BARNES SUMMER CAMP

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Walls and ceiling in comercial building not properly constructed not maintained in good repair unclean
At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection
